subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Lucas Glover shot his second consecutive 66, moving to 10 under, and took a one-stroke lead over the defending champion, Boo Weekley (64), in the Verizon Heritage at Harbour Town Golf Links on Hilton Head Island. Anthony Kim (67) was alone in third at eight under, with Stewart Cink (68), Cliff Kresge (66), and Stephen Ames (64) another shot behind.
